scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Build complete! Push to GitHub to deploy to Netlify.'
scripts.preview: npm run build && npx serve dist
scripts.check: echo 'Checking deployment setup...' && echo 'Hosting: Netlify' && echo 'Domain: www.guildsnglory.com' && echo 'Repository: github.com/copet80/guildsnglory-website'
